{{TeyvatQuest|title=The Proscribed, Hidden in Plain Sight|chapter=4|act=3|part=3}}

==Steps==
# Decide the morning schedule
# Go to the production zone to talk to Grainville
# Process widget
# Take the widget
# Give the products to Grainville

The subsequent steps depend on the dialogue options chosen, but generally follow the sequence in the [[#Stage Objective|Stage Objective]].

;Investigation
# Walk around and look for clues
#* Talk to Lynette, Fitzroy, and Deakin
#* Talk to Sigewinne, Rowan, and investigate the notebook
#** Only available after receiving the strange meat

;Pankration Ring
# Head to the Pankration Ring
# Complete the Pankration Ring Challenge
#* Hit the targets in the order in which they appear once the targeting light turns blue
# Talk to Collins

;Pankration Match
# Walk around and look for clues
#* Talk to Promoter and Collins, and investigate the Pankration Ring, then eat at the Coupon Cafeteria

==Gameplay Notes==
* Completing the quest grants the {{Achievement|Fortress Corner Society's Rules}}.

===Stage Objective===
* Complete the following objectives during your time in the Fortress of Meropide to advance the story
*# Choose to go to the production zone in the morning and gather information
*# While working the morning shift, apply for continuous working shifts with Grainville.
*# Find an opportunity to look around and collect clues regarding the "strange meat." (0/3)
*# Choose to go to the Pankration Ring in the afternoon and gather information
*# Go to the Pankration Ring after earning 3,000 Credit Coupons (0/3000)
*# Try to move about freely and gather clues regarding the Strange Blood-Colored Liquid (0/3)

===Pankration Ring===
;(If first time choosing the Pankration Ring)
:;(Talk to Collins)
::{{A|vo fdaq103 5 collins 11.ogg}} '''Collins:''' Oh? You must be {{Traveler}}, huh? Sorry, mate, but competitors as strong as you are prohibited from participating. I don't make the rules, mind you, but I was given very specific instructions...
::{{A|vo fdaq103 5 collins 12.ogg}} '''Collins:''' Even convicts value their lives, don't they? I hope you can understand, haha...
::{{A|vo fdaq103 5 collins 13.ogg}} '''Collins:''' But we have a game here that'll let you show off your strength, and you'll even earn some Credit Coupons in the process. What do you think? Interested?
::{{A|vo fdaq103 5 paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' And if we lose the game? Will it cost us Credit Coupons?
::{{A|vo fdaq103 5 collins 14.ogg}} '''Collins:''' Of course! That's the cruel reality facing every competitor in a place like the Pankration Ring.
::{{DIcon}} Alright, I'll give it a try.
::{{A|vo fdaq103 5 collins 05.ogg}} '''Collins:''' Great, let me walk you through the rules.
::{{A|vo fdaq103 5 collins 06.ogg}} '''Collins:''' The targets in front of you will pop up one after another.
::{{A|vo fdaq103 5 collins 07.ogg}} '''Collins:''' You'll need to hit the targets in the same order that they popped up. If you can complete a few rounds in a row with no mistakes, then you'll win Credit Coupons.
::{{A|vo fdaq103 5 collins 08.ogg}} '''Collins:''' But the second you mess up the order, you lose. Game over.
::{{A|vo fdaq103 5 collins 09.ogg}} '''Collins:''' The game costs 300 Credit Coupons to have a go. So, you up for it?
::{{DIcon}} Sure, got your coupons right here.
::{{A|vo fdaq103 5 collins 10.ogg}} '''Collins:''' Thanks for your patronage, mate. Now let the game begin!
;(If returning to the Pankration Ring)
::{{Black Screen|You arrive at the Pankration Ring{{sic}}}}
::{{A|vo fdaq103 5 collins 21.ogg}} '''Collins:''' Oh, back for another try? I hope you've brought enough Credit Coupons this time.
::{{DIcon}} Of course.
::{{A|vo fdaq103 5 collins 22.ogg}} '''Collins:''' Alright, then get ready to play!
;(Lost {{Item|Credit Coupons (For Use During Investigation)|x=300}})

;(Talk to Collins again, optional)
:{{A|vo dialog fdaq103 collins 02.ogg}} '''Collins:''' Machine's started, good luck!

;(Begin the challenge)
:{{A|vo fdaq103 5 paimon 04.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Okay, do your best to hit the targets, just like Collins said!

;(Complete the challenge)

;(Talk to Collins after completing the challenge)
;(If chosen on the first day)
::{{A|vo fdaq103 6 collins 01.ogg}} '''Collins:''' I'll be... they weren't exaggerating about how strong you are. Don't worry, I wouldn't dream of shortchanging you... Here're the Credit Coupons you won, put 'em somewhere safe.
:;(Obtain {{Item|Credit Coupons (For Use During Investigation)|x=400}})
;(If chosen during the afternoon shift after investigation)
::{{A|vo fdaq103 13 collins 01.ogg}} '''Collins:''' Your strength really shouldn't be underestimated. Now I get why you're prohibited from participating in any official fights.
::{{A|vo fdaq103 13 collins 02.ogg}} '''Collins:''' Nobody who values their life would be willing to get in the ring with you.
::{{DIcon}} You flatter me.
::{{DIcon}} Can't know for sure if you don't let me have a go.
::{{A|vo fdaq103 13 collins 03.ogg}} '''Collins:''' However... You two haven't tried betting on the outcome of a pankration match yet, have ya?
::{{A|vo fdaq103 13 collins 04.ogg}} '''Collins:''' Just go talk to Roussimoff. Buy a ticket for whichever fighter you think will win. There's a big payout if the fighter you support comes out on top.
::{{A|vo fdaq103 13 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' But we don't know anything about the fighters! How can we possibly know who to support...
::{{A|vo fdaq103 13 collins 05.ogg}} '''Collins:''' That's normal, just watch a few matches and get a feel for the fighters. It won't be long before you can pick winners in your sleep.
::{{A|vo fdaq103 13 paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' He's got a point... Why don't we give it a try? If we have enough coupons, we could probably bet at random until we figure everything out!
::{{A|vo fdaq103 13 collins 06.ogg}} '''Collins:''' Bet at random, huh? Uh... Well, how should I put it? It's not like you can't do that, but I'd advise you to give it some more thought first, you wouldn't want to get too carried away, eh?
::{{A|vo fdaq103 13 paimon 03.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Huh? We shouldn't get carried away? What's the problem?
::{{DIcon}} Could it be that...
::{{DIcon}} There's some sort of "rule" here?
::{{A|vo fdaq103 13 collins 07.ogg}} '''Collins:''' ...
::{{A|vo fdaq103 13 collins 08.ogg}} '''Collins:''' Never even picked a boxer before and you already know about the "rules"? You're not just strong fighters, seems you're pretty perceptive, too.
::{{DIcon}} Just a guess, that's all.
::{{DIcon}} The "hidden rules"... That's what they're called, right?
::{{A|vo fdaq103 13 collins 09.ogg}} '''Collins:''' Ah, might as well tell you about it, since you already know that much... Plus, I think you've got the potential to be one of my greatest customers, I think I can let you in a bit.

::{{A|vo fdaq103 13 paimon 05.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' So the rule is that we shouldn't pick both boxers in the same fight? But if anyone actually did that, wouldn't they be guaranteed to lose coupons... Who would do that anyway?
::{{A|vo fdaq103 13 paimon 06.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' And what do you mean by "something bad will happen"?
::{{A|vo fdaq103 13 collins 13.ogg}} '''Collins:''' How would I know? Not like I'm stupid enough to do that.
::{{A|vo fdaq103 13 collins 14.ogg}} '''Collins:''' But I've heard a story about the rule...
::{{A|vo fdaq103 13 collins 15.ogg}} '''Collins:''' According to the rumor, there was a masked boxer who possessed incredible skill and power. None of his opponents even stood a chance against him...
::{{A|vo fdaq103 13 collins 16.ogg}} '''Collins:''' However, in the final match, the organizers told him to take off his mask. He refused, and never showed up to the fight.
::{{A|vo fdaq103 13 collins 17.ogg}} '''Collins:''' And after that, he was never seen again. Some say he died, or that he was taken care of by the event's organizers. But everyone remembers that he was someone who cherished honor above all else...
::{{A|vo fdaq103 13 collins 18.ogg}} '''Collins:''' In his eyes, supporting both boxers in a match would dishonor the competition itself.
::{{A|vo fdaq103 13 paimon 07.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' So, you mean... It's like a curse? He'll take vengeance on anyone who does that?
::{{DIcon}} Do you know anything about him?
::{{DIcon}} Have you seen what he really looks like?
::{{A|vo fdaq103 13 collins 19.ogg}} '''Collins:''' No, he was always wearing a mask, like he was intentionally trying to hide his identity. I don't even know anything about his past.
::{{A|vo fdaq103 13 paimon 08.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' {{Traveler}}, do you think that boxer was...
::{{DIcon}} Thank you very much for the information.
::{{DIcon}} We'll give it a try...
::{{A|vo fdaq103 13 paimon 09.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Huh! We will!?
::{{A|vo fdaq103 13 collins 20.ogg}} '''Collins:''' You're not serious, are you?
::{{A|vo fdaq103 13 collins 21.ogg}} '''Collins:''' Look, here I was just trying to be nice and warn you, yet here you are trying to break it on purpose?
::{{A|vo fdaq103 13 paimon 10.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Yeah, it sounds pretty scary to Paimon...
::{{DIcon}} It sounds like a good lead to me.
::{{DIcon}} Nothing ventured, nothing gained.
::{{A|vo fdaq103 13 paimon 11.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' *sigh* Seems you've made up your mind... Just be sure to protect Paimon, okay?
::{{A|vo fdaq103 13 collins 22.ogg}} '''Collins:''' Betting on both fighters will set you back about 3000 Credit Coupons. If you have enough, then go ahead and give it a try... Just don't come running back to me if something happens.
:;(Obtain {{Item|Credit Coupons (For Use During Investigation)|x=700}})
:{{Black Screen|You leave the Pankration Ring and return to the dormitories...}}

===Strange Meat===
:{{Black Screen|You finish your morning work and arrive at the Coupon Cafeteria...}}
:{{Color|menu|During lunch, you go to the Coupon Cafeteria, just as you normally do...}}
:{{A|vo fdaq103 10 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Paimon's exhausted, it's just work, work, and more work... Paimon's little body can't handle this much longer...
:{{A|vo fdaq103 10 paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Wait a sec, now that Paimon thinks about it... Haven't we been working nonstop for three days now? And now it's lunchtime!
:{{DIcon}} Mm.
:{{DIcon}} You're just realizing that now?
:{{A|vo fdaq103 10 paimon 03.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh, Paimon feels a shiver going down her spine! What's going to happen?
:{{A|vo fdaq103 10 paimon 04.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' But it doesn't seem like anything's changed at all... And we made it to the Coupon Cafeteria safely.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 10 paimon 05.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Are the so-called "hidden rules" only a rumor, after all?
:{{DIcon}} Don't get your hopes up.
:{{DIcon}} That would be quite a disappointment.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 10 paimon 06.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Well, there's no use just guessing all day. Paimon's stomach has been grumbling the whole time, let's just eat already...
:{{A|vo fdaq103 10 paimon 07.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Paimon wonders what we'll get today! Maybe we'll get the super lucky meal...
:{{A|vo fdaq103 10 paimon 08.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Wait, what!?
:{{DIcon}} Huh!?
:{{DIcon}} This is...
:{{A|vo fdaq103 10 paimon 09.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Wh&mdash;What in the world is this!? What's with Paimon's food? And yours is the same...
:{{A|vo fdaq103 10 paimon 10.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Is this stuff... meat? But it looks and feels so bizarre... What kind of chef would make food like this?
:{{DIcon}} I've never seen a welfare meal like this.
:{{DIcon}} There's something wrong with this "meat."
:{{A|vo fdaq103 10 paimon 11.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' What do you think is going on, {{Traveler}}? Is this the "bad thing" that Rowan was talking about?
:{{DIcon}} Someone went missing before...
:{{DIcon}} And now our meals have this "strange meat"...
:{{A|vo fdaq103 10 paimon 12.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' N&mdash;no, stop right there, Paimon gets what you mean! Just don't say it!
:{{A|vo fdaq103 10 paimon 13.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Hey, isn't that Wolsey over there? He must've made the food, right? So let's just ask him about the food and be done with it!
:{{A|vo fdaq103 10 paimon 14.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Hey, Wolsey! Have a moment?
:{{A|vo fdaq103 10 wolsey 01.ogg}} '''Wolsey:''' Hmm, what is it? I'm about to go report the numbers for today's free meal, so you'd better make it quick.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 10 paimon 15.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Uh, it's about the meat in our meals. Look, does it seem... normal to you?
:{{A|vo fdaq103 10 wolsey 02.ogg}} '''Wolsey:''' The meat? Oh, that... It looks perfectly fine to me, totally normal. You'd better hurry up and chow down.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 10 paimon 16.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' H&mdash;How could THIS be fine? Hey! Don't leave! You barely even looked at it... HEY!
:{{A|vo fdaq103 10 paimon 17.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' What should we do now? Wolsey wouldn't even give us the time of day... is he trying to hide something?
:{{DIcon}} Looks like we'll have to investigate it ourselves.
:{{DIcon}} The plot thickens.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 10 paimon 18.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Yeah, looks like we have no other choice. Paimon was positively famished a minute ago, but now she's lost her appetite...
:;(Obtain [[Clue Book (Fortress of Meropide)]] entry, ''The Strange Meat'')
:;(Continue to "What would you like to do this afternoon?" in [[#Coupon Cafeteria|Coupon Cafeteria]] with only the choice to investigate)

;(Talk to Fitzroy)<!--1 of the 3 quest objectives-->

:{{A|vo fdaq103 18 fitzroy 02.ogg}} '''Fitzroy:''' Sorry, I couldn't help but think of His Grace once I saw you, and I&mdash;I...

:{{A|vo fdaq103 18 fitzroy 03.ogg}} '''Fitzroy:''' It's hard to say... Maybe I am. He's got a very overwhelming presence. It makes me feel like I'm just some insignificant little bug...
:{{A|vo fdaq103 18 paimon 03.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Wait, seriously?
:{{A|vo fdaq103 18 fitzroy 04.ogg}} '''Fitzroy:''' I'm always indecisive, and I tend to make a mess of things... It's like a reflex, I just instantly start to tense up the moment I see a smart and capable person like His Grace...
:{{DIcon}} Oh, I get it, you want to take his place.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 18 fitzroy 05.ogg}} '''Fitzroy:''' What!? P&mdash;Please, d&mdash;don't say anything like that out loud... How could you possibly think something like that!?

;(Talk to Fitzroy again, optional)
:{{A|vo dialog fdaq103 fitzroy 01.ogg}} '''Fitzroy:''' In the eyes of His Grace, I'm probably just a lowly, ordinary person... *sigh* I guess I need to start working on my nerves.

:{{A|vo fdaq103 18 lynette 01.ogg}} '''Lynette:''' Oh wonderful! I was worried that you'd be busy trying to earn Reward Coupons all the time, but it seems like you haven't neglected your investigation work after all.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 18 paimon 04.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Paimon likes having more coupons, but no one wants to work all the time.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 18 paimon 05.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Have you also been investigating the area, Lynette?
:{{A|vo fdaq103 18 lynette 02.ogg}} '''Lynette:''' No, I was just slacking off and you happened to catch me.
:{{DIcon}} And how's Lyney holding up?
:{{A|vo fdaq103 18 lynette 03.ogg}} '''Lynette:''' My brother is still obsessed with anything remotely related to the "forbidden zone." But knowing him, it won't be long before we get more leads.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 18 lynette 04.ogg}} '''Lynette:''' Oh, before I forget, this is for you.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 18 paimon 06.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Huh? Credit Coupons? Why are you giving us these?
:{{A|vo fdaq103 18 lynette 05.ogg}} '''Lynette:''' I've been here longer than you. Coupons aren't a resource in particularly short supply. What is in short supply are interesting people to talk with.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 18 paimon 07.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Aw, that's so nice of you, Lynette. We'll be sure to make good use of these coupons then. Thanks a bunch!
:;(Obtain {{Item|Credit Coupons (For Use During Investigation)|x=400}})

::{{A|vo fdaq103 18 deakin 08.ogg}} '''Deakin:''' *sigh* C'mon, I insist. These coupons are nothing compared to getting the attention of His Grace. I won't take no for an answer, haha.

;(If the "His attitude could use some work" option was chosen)

:{{A|vo fdaq103 18 deakin 03.ogg}} '''Deakin:''' Just like His Grace said, paying attention to every little detail is the key to prosperity. Hmm, maybe this is the true meaning of "rebirth," not just earning Credit Coupons...

::{{Color|menu|In order to investigate the truth behind the "strange meal box," you decide to look for more leads.}}
:;(Talk to Rowan)<!--2nd quest marker-->
::{{Color|menu|You run into Rowan near the infirmary...}}
::{{A|vo fdaq103 11 paimon 13.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Huh? Rowan? What are you doing here, Chief?
::{{A|vo fdaq103 11 rowan 01.ogg}} '''Rowan:''' Oh, uh... I was injured a bit just now. Nothing major, I think I just pulled something. Little mishaps like this are unavoidable at work, y'know...
::{{A|vo fdaq103 11 paimon 14.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Huh, Paimon wouldn't have thought someone as experienced as the Chief would still get hurt on the job...
::{{A|vo fdaq103 11 rowan 02.ogg}} '''Rowan:''' Tch, I just knew you would say that... This is pretty embarrassing... *sigh* Ugh, where is Sigewinne when you need her anyway? The one time I need to make a quick trip to the infirmary...
::{{A|vo fdaq103 11 paimon 15.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh? You mean she wasn't in the infirmary?
::{{A|vo fdaq103 11 rowan 03.ogg}} '''Rowan:''' Yeah, the rumors say that there's never anybody in the infirmary in the half hour before lunch, and nobody knows where Sigewinne gets off to.
::{{DIcon}} So this isn't just a coincidence...
::{{DIcon}} But she's always absent during lunch?
::{{A|vo fdaq103 11 paimon 16.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Huh, that's actually really strange. Sigewinne's always super dedicated to her work, where else would she possibly go...?
::{{A|vo fdaq103 11 rowan 04.ogg}} '''Rowan:''' *sigh* Forget it, I can take care of a small sprain like this on my own anyway, no need to trouble her.
::;(Obtain [[Clue Book (Fortress of Meropide)]] entry, ''The Empty Infirmary'')
::&nbsp;
:;(Approach the marked location)<!--3rd quest marker-->
::{{Color|menu|You find research notes near the entrance to the infirmary...}}
::{{A|vo fdaq103 11 paimon 06.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Hey look, there's something here... looks like a research notebook.
::{{A|vo fdaq103 11 paimon 07.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' That suspicious guy peeking into the infirmary just now... Are they a fan of Sigewinne?
::{{A|vo fdaq103 11 paimon 08.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' He must have dropped this. Let Paimon read it real quick...
::{{A|vo fdaq103 11 paimon 09.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' ...The Melusine perceive the world very differently from humans, there are significant deviations...
::{{A|vo fdaq103 11 paimon 10.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' ...As a result, their sense of aesthetics and beauty is also very different from that of humans. This must be taken into consideration when giving gifts.
::{{A|vo fdaq103 11 paimon 11.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Whoa, this all sounds pretty serious... He sure did his homework.
::{{DIcon}} Won't he object to us looking through his notes?
::{{DIcon}} We should thank him for the intel.
::{{A|vo fdaq103 11 paimon 12.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' And as for the notebook... Let's take it.
::;(Obtain [[Clue Book (Fortress of Meropide)]] entry, ''Research About the Characteristics of Melusines'')
::&nbsp;
:;(Talk to Sigewinne)<!--1st quest marker-->
::{{Color|menu|You see Sigewinne in the production zone...}}
::{{A|vo fdaq103 11 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Sigewinne? Aren't you supposed to be in the infirmary? What are you doing in the production zone?
::{{A|vo fdaq103 11 sigewinne 01.ogg}} '''Sigewinne:''' Hello, {{Traveler}}, Paimon.
::{{A|vo fdaq103 11 sigewinne 02.ogg}} '''Sigewinne:''' Everyone's usually busy around now, and we don't have any patients to look after in the infirmary, I thought I'd come here and enjoy the sight of everyone hard at work.
::{{A|vo fdaq103 11 paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Enjoy? What's there to enjoy here...?
::{{A|vo fdaq103 11 sigewinne 03.ogg}} '''Sigewinne:''' It's really worth watching... I often stand here and observe everyone. Humans are just so interesting and adorable, I like to watch your expressions while you work.
::{{A|vo fdaq103 11 paimon 03.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Uh... Are you talking about pets or people?
::{{DIcon}} Do you also happen to be a veterinarian as well as head nurse?
::{{A|vo fdaq103 11 sigewinne 04.ogg}} '''Sigewinne:''' Oh... I can see why you'd think that, but you shouldn't jump to conclusions.
::{{A|vo fdaq103 11 sigewinne 05.ogg}} '''Sigewinne:''' See, we Melusines are a different species, and we see the world very differently from humans. It's very easy for me to observe everyone's condition. All it takes is one look and I can tell which workers are exhausted.
::{{A|vo fdaq103 11 paimon 04.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Wait, Melusines can see that? Huh, that does sound useful for being a nurse.
::{{A|vo fdaq103 11 sigewinne 06.ogg}} '''Sigewinne:''' Yes, running around tending to everyone's health is very fulfilling, but I'd much prefer it if you were all happy and free from exhaustion and pain in the first place.
::{{A|vo fdaq103 11 sigewinne 07.ogg}} '''Sigewinne:''' Take care of your body and make sure you eat well. Always rest when you're tired from work and don't push yourself too hard.
::{{A|vo fdaq103 11 paimon 05.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' We'll definitely take care of ourselves, thanks for the reminder!
::;(Obtain [[Clue Book (Fortress of Meropide)]] entry, ''The Supervisor, Sigewinne'')

;(Return to the dormitories and sleep after finding all clues)
:{{A|vo fdaq103 7 paimon 11.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh? You want to stop investigating and go rest?
:{{DIcon}} It's time for a rest.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 7 paimon 12.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Okay, you should rest up. We'll be back at it tomorrow!

===Pankration Match===
:{{Black Screen|You arrive at the Pankration Ring}}
:{{Color|menu|You have saved up enough Credit Coupons.}}
:{{A|vo fdaq103 14 roussimoff 01.ogg}} '''Roussimoff:''' Hmm? Are you two here to buy tickets? Better be quick about it, another match is about to start!
:{{A|vo fdaq103 14 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Who are the boxers in the next round?
:{{A|vo fdaq103 14 roussimoff 02.ogg}} '''Roussimoff:''' We have the reigning champ, "Le Grappleur," versus a contender from the eastern prison block, "Demon Horde."
:{{A|vo fdaq103 14 paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Are those their nicknames? Or did they choose those names themselves... either way, suuuper weird.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 14 roussimoff 03.ogg}} '''Roussimoff:''' Since you're new around here, I'll help you out and give you a little suggestion. Even though Le Grappleur is the crowd favorite, Demon Horde is a first-class dark horse with incredible potential...
:{{A|vo fdaq103 14 roussimoff 04.ogg}} '''Roussimoff:''' Anyway, for this match, I recommend that you pick...
:{{DIcon}} We'll buy tickets for both fighters.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 14 roussimoff 05.ogg}} '''Roussimoff:''' Huh? F&mdash;For both fighters?
:{{A|vo fdaq103 14 roussimoff 06.ogg}} '''Roussimoff:''' Uh, I could tell you're new to this, but I didn't think you were completely clueless...
:{{A|vo fdaq103 14 roussimoff 07.ogg}} '''Roussimoff:''' Maybe you don't quite understand the rules, no? Let me try to explain again for you, more clearly. You see...
:{{A|vo fdaq103 14 paimon 03.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh, no need, no need... We're aware that we're going to lose coupons.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 14 roussimoff 08.ogg}} '''Roussimoff:''' ...Alright, then, if you're absolutely sure. Remember, no refunds once you buy the tickets.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 14 paimon 04.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Yeah, yeah, we got it. Just shut up and take our coupons!
:{{Black Screen|You leave the Pankration Ring and return to the dormitories...}}
:{{A|vo fdaq103 8 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' *sigh* Looks like we won't get a chance to sleep in as long as we're here. Let's get to bed early.

:{{Color|menu|The next morning, you receive an unexpected package...}}
:{{A|vo fdaq103 15 fielding 01.ogg}} '''Fielding:''' Hey, Traveler, Paimon! Package here for ya.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 15 fielding 02.ogg}} '''Fielding:''' The next time you buy something, go pick it up yourself. I'm not a deliveryman, you know.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 15 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Huh? A package... For us? Did you buy something, {{Traveler}}? *yawn* Paimon's not quite awake yet, so why don't you go take a look...
:{{DIcon}} I didn't buy anything.
:{{DIcon}} Unless, this is...
:{{A|vo fdaq103 15 paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Ah, right! Yesterday we broke the "hidden rule" and bought tickets for both boxers. Maybe this package is the "bad thing" that Collins said would happen...
:{{A|vo fdaq103 15 paimon 03.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Uh, Paimon suddenly feels wide awake! Wait, maybe let Paimon go hide somewhere first. Just call for Paimon AFTER you've opened it!
:{{A|vo fdaq103 15 paimon 04.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Hey, wait, wait! Paimon's still here, don't open it! Ahh!
:{{DIcon}} Doesn't seem especially scary.
:{{DIcon}} But there is something a little odd inside.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 15 paimon 05.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Huh? What is it? Are you okay?
:{{A|vo fdaq103 15 paimon 06.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' L&mdash;Let Paimon take a peek too...
:[[File:Clue Book The Strange Blood-Colored Fluid.png|120px]]
:{{A|vo fdaq103 15 paimon 07.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh, it's just a small bottle... but the color of the liquid inside looks so wrong, almost like...
:{{DIcon}} Hmm, rumor has it that a boxer went missing...
:{{DIcon}} And the liquid in the bottle obviously looks like blood...
:{{A|vo fdaq103 15 paimon 08.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Alright, that's enough of that! No need to say it out loud, Paimon already knows what you're trying to say...
:{{DIcon}} Do you want to give it a sniff?
:{{DIcon}} Do you want to give it a taste?
:{{A|vo fdaq103 15 paimon 09.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Blegh, no way! Get that stuff away from Paimon!
:{{DIcon}} Seems we'll have to investigate.
:{{DIcon}} This place is chock-full of strange happenings after all...
:{{A|vo fdaq103 15 paimon 10.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Paimon thinks we shouldn't open the bottle until we've figured out what's going on. Just trust Paimon on this one, okay!?
:;(Obtain [[Clue Book (Fortress of Meropide)]] entry, ''The Strange Blood-Colored Fluid'')
:{{A|vo fdaq103 2 paimon 04.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' What do you plan on doing now?
:{{DIcon}} Investigate the clues you discovered (-400 Coupons)
:;{{Color|menu|In order to investigate the truth behind the "strange package," you decide to look for more leads.}}
::{{A|vo fdaq103 3 paimon 09.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Though it feels nice to slack off a little, less work means less coupons... Let's make the most of our morning!

;(Talk to Collins)
:{{Color|menu|You and Collins discuss the matter...}}
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 collins 01.ogg}} '''Collins:''' I heard you crazy fools really did it, you bought tickets to support both fighters, didn't ya? Well? Did anything happen?
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Well, the next day we received a mysterious package, but we still haven't made any sense of the contents...
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 collins 02.ogg}} '''Collins:''' So it is real... You didn't become cursed or anything like that, did ya? Are you both still okay? Wait, are you sure that it's still you controlling your bodies right now?
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Uh, Paimon's not sure... What do you think, {{Traveler}}? Is Paimon still Paimon?
:{{DIcon}} Only you'd ever ask such a question, so I'm pretty sure you're fine.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 paimon 03.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh, okay... well, that's good!
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 collins 03.ogg}} '''Collins:''' Yeah, you two don't seem to have changed at all, but I wouldn't let your guard down just yet...
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 collins 04.ogg}} '''Collins:''' Still, I didn't expect you would actually do it. You'd actually throw away coupons like that, just to satisfy your curiosity?
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 paimon 04.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Even if we bought tickets like everybody else, it's not like we could hope to earn any coupons...
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 paimon 05.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' When it comes to things like this, it's always the organizer who makes the real profits.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 collins 05.ogg}} '''Collins:''' Hey, just what are you trying to imply? The Pankration Ring is an honest business, and we really don't make much from selling tickets...
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 collins 06.ogg}} '''Collins:''' We make so little that even the current tournaments can only be held thanks to funding from the producer of Fonta.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 paimon 06.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh, so it's the company that manufactures Fonta sponsoring the events? Paimon thought all of this was thanks to the Duke's support.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 collins 07.ogg}} '''Collins:''' Let's just say it's a mutually beneficial arrangement... They reached out to us first, hoping to promote Fonta products in the Fortress of Meropide.
:{{DIcon}} I understand.
:{{DIcon}} That's some important info.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 collins 08.ogg}} '''Collins:''' *sigh* Anyway, you try and take extra good care of yourselves these next few days, you hear?
:;(Obtain [[Clue Book (Fortress of Meropide)]] entry, ''Sponsor of the Pankration Tournament'')

;(Talk to Collins again, optional)
:{{A|vo dialog fdaq103 collins 01.ogg}} '''Collins:''' Oh, it's you. Heh, you must be absolutely loaded with coupons if you have time to stroll around like this.

;(Approach the scattered papers near the Pankration Ring)
:{{Color|menu|You find some scattered information around the Pankration Ring...}}
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 paimon 07.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Hey, what are these papers scattered all over the ground? Are they registration forms or something?
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 paimon 08.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Hmm, maybe not... Every page has the Fonta Co. symbol on it. Maybe it's some flyers from the company?
:{{DIcon}} Let's take a look before anyone else shows up.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 paimon 09.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Uh, okay. But if someone catches us, they could accuse us of trying to steal the company's secrets, couldn't they?
:{{DIcon}} What're you afraid of? We're already convicted criminals.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 paimon 10.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh, hehe, you're right! Guess there's nothing to worry about then, let Paimon have a look here...
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 paimon 11.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' ...Without assistance from the Fontaine Research Institute, development of the new product has been slow, and some researchers on the project have voiced concerns.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 paimon 12.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' We have no choice but to let the new product undergo the first phase of promotional trials without a designated name or packaging. We will adjust the direction of future development according to feedback...
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 paimon 13.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' We have decided to only conduct closed, small-scale trials for the time being...
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 paimon 14.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Sure doesn't seem like anything unusual... The company is just trying to develop some new products besides Fonta, but it sounds like things aren't going well at all.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 paimon 15.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Let's put these papers back where we found them, and make it look like nobody went through them... Okay, good.
:;(Obtain [[Clue Book (Fortress of Meropide)]] entry, ''New Products Under Development'')

;(Talk to Promoter)
:{{Color|menu|You meet a product promoter from the Fonta Company...}}
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 promoter 01.ogg}} '''Promoter:''' *sigh* If there's no way to send it all out, then maybe I'll never get a chance to leave...
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 paimon 16.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Uh, who are you? We've never seen you before, and you don't look like a fellow convict.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 promoter 02.ogg}} '''Promoter:''' I'm not! Of course I'm not. Please don't mistake me for a criminal, I'm a good, law-abiding citizen.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 paimon 17.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Then what are you doing here? You sure seem anxious about something.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 promoter 03.ogg}} '''Promoter:''' I'm a promoter for Fonta Co., and I'm usually responsible for promoting our drink products. I thought I could complete my task here quickly and return to headquarters, but I've been here way longer than I anticipated...
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 paimon 18.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh, a promoter from Fonta Co.! So what kind of problem did you run into?
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 promoter 04.ogg}} '''Promoter:''' Ugh, I'm so upset... It's all because of that Duke.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 promoter 05.ogg}} '''Promoter:''' After discussing the company's promotional plans with him, he told me outright that my project was worthless.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 promoter 06.ogg}} '''Promoter:''' However, in light of our long history of successful collaboration, I still tried to patiently explain the details. However, to my surprise, he just cut me off while I was speaking!
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 promoter 07.ogg}} '''Promoter:''' Let me take a moment and recall his exact words...
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 promoter 08.ogg}} '''Promoter:''' I'm just gonna stop you there and say no. If anything, I'm saving you time.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 promoter 09.ogg}} '''Promoter:''' It seems you don't fully understand the value of Credit Coupons here, nor do you understand the value of your own products. The former is because you are from the overworld, that's understandable and I don't blame you for that.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 promoter 10.ogg}} '''Promoter:''' But as for the latter, only someone monumentally stupid, so breathtakingly stupid that they were completely ignorant of the value of Credit Coupons despite living in the underworld would ever possibly consider buying your drink. Let's just forget it.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 promoter 11.ogg}} '''Promoter:''' Anyway, that's how he rejected my proposal and asked me to come up with another solution with the condition that it doesn't cause any trouble for him. Can you believe that guy...?
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 paimon 19.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Uh, well, he is the head honcho here. Not much you can do about that. We met him too and could tell that he's the kind of guy that's hard to pin down.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 16 promoter 12.ogg}} '''Promoter:''' Fine, fine, I should just let it go... I'm on his turf, after all. His house, his rules.
:;(Obtain [[Clue Book (Fortress of Meropide)]] entry, ''Dissatisfaction with the Duke'')

;(Talk to Promoter again, optional)
:{{A|vo dialog fdaq103 promoter 01.ogg}} '''Promoter:''' I just don't want to be stuck here forever...

;(Eat at the Coupon Cafeteria)
:{{A|vo fdaq103 7 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Huh, we ended up here without even thinking about it... Wanna grab something to eat?
:{{DIcon}} Let's end the shift.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 7 paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Alright, but remember that we bought this time with coupons, so let's make better use of it next time.
:;(Continue to the meal in [[#Coupon Cafeteria|Coupon Cafeteria]])

===End===
;(After all relevant clues in this quest have been found and the day ends)
:{{A|vo fdaq103 17 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' A mysterious box, a bottle of crimson liquid... Paimon still doesn't know what to make of it.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 17 paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Do you have any ideas, {{Traveler}}?
:{{DIcon}} I think I've got something...
:{{DIcon}} But unfortunately, it's not related to Childe.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 17 paimon 03.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Really? Then it looks like that part of the investigation led us nowhere...
:{{A|vo fdaq103 17 paimon 04.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Well, we'll keep searching for more clues tomorrow. Good night, {{Traveler}}.
:;(Time passes and the quest ends)
{{Dialogue End}}

===Unsorted Voice-Overs===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{A|vo dialog fdaq103 deakin 01.ogg}} '''Deakin:''' Just like His Grace said, paying attention to every little detail is the key to prosperity. Hmm, maybe this is the true meaning of "rebirth," not just earning Credit Coupons...
:{{A|vo dialog fdaq103 grainville 01.ogg}} '''Grainville:''' What're you two doing here? Don't know how to take a day off?
:{{A|vo dialog fdaq103 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' No, no, not at all! Not working really agrees with us!
:{{A|vo fdaq103 3 paimon 08a 1.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Wow! Impressive philosophy. Could that be the secret sauce behind the blond Traveler's success?
:{{A|vo fdaq103 3 paimon 10.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' We don't have enough coupons to skip work, let's go earn some more before trying to take any time off.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 4 paimon 06b 1.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Ugh, it costs 300 Credit Coupons to enter the ring.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 4 paimon 06b 2.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Let's save enough coupons first, and do something else for now.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 4 paimon 13.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Wow, giving it your all even when it's just a game. That's {{Traveler}} for ya!
:{{A|vo fdaq103 5 collins 01.ogg}} '''Collins:''' Oh? You must be {{Traveler}}, huh? Sorry, mate, but competitors as strong as you are prohibited from participating. I don't make the rules, mind you, but I was given very specific instructions...
:{{A|vo fdaq103 5 collins 02.ogg}} '''Collins:''' Even convicts value their lives, don't they? I hope you can understand, haha...
:{{A|vo fdaq103 5 collins 03.ogg}} '''Collins:''' But we have a game here that'll let you show off your strength, and you'll even earn some Credit Coupons in the process. What do you think? Interested?
:{{A|vo fdaq103 5 collins 04.ogg}} '''Collins:''' Of course! That's the cruel reality facing every competitor in a place like the Pankration Ring.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 5 collins 15.ogg}} '''Collins:''' OK. Great, let me walk you through the rules.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 5 collins 16.ogg}} '''Collins:''' The targets in front of you will pop up one after another.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 5 collins 17.ogg}} '''Collins:''' You'll need to hit the targets in the same order that they popped up. If you can complete a few rounds in a row with no mistakes, then you'll win Credit Coupons.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 5 collins 18.ogg}} '''Collins:''' But the second you mess up the order, you lose. Game over.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 5 collins 19.ogg}} '''Collins:''' The game costs 300 Credit Coupons to have a go. So, you up for it?
:{{A|vo fdaq103 5 collins 20.ogg}} '''Collins:''' Then come back once you've got enough coupons, I'll still be here to start the game for ya.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 5 collins 23.ogg}} '''Collins:''' Not bad, not bad at all... Here, the coupons you won. Be sure not to lose 'em.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 5 collins 24.ogg}} '''Collins:''' You lost, mate... An off day for you, innit? You'll do better next time.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 5 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' And if we lose the game? Will it cost us Credit Coupons?
:{{A|vo fdaq103 5 paimon 03.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Guess we'll have to come back later. For now, we can either look for more leads or go back and rest.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 5 paimon 06.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh no, we lost this time...<!--
:{{A|vo fdaq103 5 paimon 07.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' {{tx|Unused VO?}}-->
:{{A|vo fdaq103 6 collins 02.ogg}} '''Collins:''' Pity, mate, you lost... that's too bad. I bet you'll get it next time though, won't ya?
:{{A|vo fdaq103 7 paimon 03.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Alright... By the way, it seems like we haven't found all the clues regarding the strange meal box.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 7 paimon 04.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Paimon just hopes to get some normal food today.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 7 paimon 05.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Alright... By the way, it seems like we still haven't found all the clues regarding the strange liquid.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 7 paimon 06.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' No more strange packages are gonna show up... right?
:{{A|vo fdaq103 7 paimon 07.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh, okay then...
:{{A|vo fdaq103 7 paimon 13.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Alright... By the way, it seems like we still haven't found all the clues regarding the strange meal box.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 7 paimon 14.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Paimon hopes tomorrow's food will be a little more normal...
:{{A|vo fdaq103 7 paimon 15.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Alright... By the way, it seems like we still haven't found all the clues regarding the strange liquid.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 7 paimon 16.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' No more strange packages are gonna show up... right?
:{{A|vo fdaq103 7 paimon 17.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh, okay then...
:{{A|vo fdaq103 12 paimon 04.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Well, maybe we'll have better luck tomorrow. Good night, {{Traveler}}.
:{{A|vo fdaq103 18 deakin 01.ogg}} '''Deakin:''' Hey! It's {{Traveler}} and Paimon!
:{{A|vo fdaq103 18 deakin 02.ogg}} '''Deakin:''' Haha, no need to tease me, okay? I won't trip on the same step twice.
{{Dialogue End}}
